name: CHAOS HOUR - Website Development & Entertainment Platform
blurb: Chaos Hour will be a primary source of indie comics, games and movies which will appeal to geeks and gamers all over the world.

rewards.reward: No Reward
*IN IT TO WIN!* A much appreciated thank you which will be given out on our online stream and recorded for you to watch over and over. Other benefits which will be featured on the Chaos Hour Website.
*MASCOT*\r\n\r\n'Digital Treasure Chest' with high quality wallpapers + Sincere thank you and shout out which will be announced via our live stream, website and Twitter.

**SUPPORTER** 2 X 8x11 Art Prints designed and created by Padraig Balch himself. You will also get thank you credits on our online stream and on the brand new website once it is online. (This is an exclusive reward and is not involved in any other reward tiers)
*SOLDIER*\r\n\r\nPrevious Rewards + Postcard Print with Personal message from the team themselves + 1 Month access to the Chaos Legion.

**LIMITED OFFER** CHAOS HOUR T-SHIRT + Thanks given during live stream and on website. This is a limited offer due to huge demand. **This Reward Is Not Included in Main Rewards And Is Seperate To All Other Reward Packages**

-SMALL WEB ADVERT- 125x125 Pixel Advert which will be visible on the majority of Chaos Hour pages and all article pages. For a 1 month Duration whenever you want. However the months will be allocated on a first come first serve basis. You can provide your own artwork or we will create something effective for you. (Not Included in *KNIGHT* Reward Package)

**FANATIC** 2 X 8x11 Art Prints designed and created by Padraig Balch himself. You will also get thank you credits on our online stream and on the brand new website once it is online. + Limited Edition Chaos Hour Kickstarter Shirt available in any Size. (This is an exclusive reward and is not involved in any other reward tiers)
*KNIGHT*\r\n\r\nPrevious Rewards + Exclusive 11 x 8 Chaos Hour Print, Signed by the artist + Upgraded to 2 Month access to the Chaos Legion.

-MEDIUM WEB ADVERT- 300x250 Pixel Advert which will be visible on the majority of Chaos Hour pages and all article pages. For a 1 month Duration whenever you want. However the months will be allocated on a first come first serve basis. You can provide your own artwork or we will create something effective for you. (Not Included in GUARDIAN / BARBARIAN Packages)

**COLLECTOR** 2 X 8x11 Art Prints designed and created by Padraig Balch himself. You will also get thank you credits on our online stream and on the brand new website once it is online. + Limited Edition Chaos Hour Kickstarter Shirt available in any Size. + 2 8x11 Art Prints by the talented artist Anastasia Catirs. Each print will be signed by the artists themselves. (This is an exclusive reward and is not involved in any other reward tiers)
*GUARDIAN*\r\n\r\nPrevious Rewards (Not including 'Small Web Advert' Reward) + Exclusive Chaos Hour Shirt made to your size + Upgraded to 3 Month access to the Chaos Legion.
*BARBARIAN*\r\n\r\nPrevious Rewards (Not including 'Small Web Advert' & 'Medium-Web Advert Reward) + Upgraded to 6 Month access to the Chaos Legion.

-VIDEO ADVERTISER- 60% OFF\r\n\r\nHigh Quality Advert created by the Chaos Hour team for your brand, product or company. This will be featured at the start, during and finish of EVERY live twitch broadcast and youtube video for ONE MONTH of your choice. You will also be awarded with a featured article for your brand or product. (Not included in physical reward reward tiers)

-LARGE WEB ADVERT + FEATURED ARTICLE- 300x600 Pixel Advert which will be visible on the majority of Chaos Hour pages and all article pages. For a 1 month Duration whenever you want. However the months will be allocated on a first come first serve basis. You can provide your own artwork or we will create something effective for you. You will also be given a featured article for your brand or product. (NOT Included in ChaosGuard Package)

*CHAOS GUARD*\r\n\r\nPrevious Awards (Not including 'Small Web Advert' and 'Medium Web Advert' Rewards) + Exclusive Chaos Legion 11 x 17 Poster + Shirt Upgraded to Chaos Legion Limited Edition Kickstarter Shirt + Upgraded to LIFETIME access to the Chaos Legion.
*PYROMANCER*\r\n\r\n"Chaos Guard Rewards" + 3 High Quality Prints from Anastasia Catris (SIGNED) + Personal Thank You Video From The Team.
*NECROMANCER* \r\n\r\n"Chaos Guard Rewards" + 3 High Quality Prints from Padraig Balch (SIGNED) + Personal Thank You Video From The Team
*HIGH WIZARD* \r\n\r\n"Pyromancer Rewards" + Custom Sketch Card (2.5"x3.5") Drawn By Anastasia Catris With a character of your choice (Fan Art/OC/Custom).
*GUN-MAGE* \r\n\r\n"Necromancer Rewards" + Original Custom High Quality 11 x 8 Print created by Padraig Balch. This print will be a ONE OF A KIND exclusive created just for you.
*HERO* \r\n\r\nAll Previous Rewards (Excluding Web + Video Advertiser Packages) + Your name or brand Immortalized within the Chaos Hour Website.

-HIGH IMPACT WEBSITE TAKEOVER-\r\n\r\nHigh Quality and High Impact Advertising Campaign for you, your brand, company or products. Dominant site take over including background advert and top centre banner which will have a featured article and be dominant within every single article on Chaos Hour for ONE MONTH of your choice. You will also recieve a high quality advert which will run at the start, during and end of each and every live stream or youtube video.

*DEMI GOD* \r\n\r\nALL Previous Rewards Including Both Physical and Media Related Rewards (Including High Impact Website Takeover - excludes small and medium web adverts) + A Dominant Advert for the brand, product or company of your choice for a WHOLE YEAR.
